item.description:
Come and join us for a night shoot in Davis Square!

Davis square is the new Harvard Square now that capitalism as taken hold there and Davis square comes closest to the rich cultural and funky feel that Harvard Square once had some 20 years ago.

There's lots of traffic coming from different angles and people all around, different and interesting bits of architecture and businesses. Some interesting spots are the Theatre, the bowling alley, the bars and coffee shops, all offer tidbits of urban and retro imagery.

We will meet at 8:45PM and spend an hour or so walking the streets, grab a coffee and look for unique bits of cambridge to capture, we can stay out longer if you like, but I know it's a "school night".

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: Night Shoot in Davis Square
